column6: Declan Shalvey & JORDIE BELLAIRE (A/C) - A threat from the first issue is back to cause problems for Moon Knight! - This mysterious person is the new BLACK SPECTRE and it doesn't mean anything good for the protector of night travelers. - Don't miss the conclusion of Warren Ellis, Declan Shalvey and Jordie Bellaire.
column8: | penciller (cover):Jordan Diane Bellaire | penciller (cover):Declan Shalvey | writer:Warren Ellis
